author: xtqqczze

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
The rule is enable for public members only. Since we have no complains we could force the rule to avoid breaking changes in public API in future.

@xtqqczze  Could you please check the rule for internal and private?

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: 4e28528 enables rule for internal and private too.
